title: Get a 15-inch MacBook Air for $999 in this wild blowout sale
content:
Macworld

Even with an M2 chip, the 15-inch MacBook Air is the perfect Mac for casual users and pros alike at an excellent price of $1,299. And today it’s impossible to pass up: Best Buy is selling the 15-inch MacBook Air with 256GB of storage for $999 and the 512GB model for $1,199, a savings of $300 and the best price we’ve ever seen.

The 15-inch MacBook Air is one of the best laptops around, with a gorgeous Liquid Retina display and a thin and light design that strikes a perfect balance between size and portability. You’ll also get a speedy M2 processor, all-day battery life, fast charging with a MagSafe connector and a pair of Thunderbolt ports. Apple is expected to update the laptop soon but it’s likely to be little more than a speed bump.

In our 4.5-star review, we praised the “absolutely excellent processor” and “bright, sharp, and colorful” display, but that’s nothing compared to what Vision Pro will turn it into. So grab one now and get ready for the age of spatial computing.
